body_html:
We should make .numpy not return a raw numpy array, but a wrapper that uses __array_finalize__ and other numy specific functions to keep it in sync with the original tensor. This will solve all the issues.

Anyway, I think this PR might introduce some bugs
body_text:
We should make .numpy not return a raw numpy array, but a wrapper that uses __array_finalize__ and other numy specific functions to keep it in sync with the original tensor. This will solve all the issues.
Anyway, I think this PR might introduce some bugs
body:
We should make `.numpy` not return a raw numpy array, but a wrapper that uses `__array_finalize__` and other numy specific functions to keep it in sync with the original tensor. This will solve all the issues.

Anyway, I think this PR might introduce some bugs
